metadata.name: Rundll32 Spawned Via Explorer.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects execution of "rundll32.exe" with a parent process of Explorer.exe. This has been observed by variants of Raspberry Robin, as first reported by Red Canary.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\explorer.exe')) AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\rundll32.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('rundll32.exe') AND NOT (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' c:\\windows\\system32\\')) AND endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -localserver 22d8c27b-47a1-48d1-ad08-7da7abd79617'))))

output.summary: Detects execution of "rundll32.exe" with a parent process of Explorer.exe. This has been observed by variants of Raspberry Robin, as first reported by Red Canary.
